page.title: 15LUXURIES IN OUR HOMES.
page.content:
We surveyed the children in our class to discover what kinds of luxuries they had in their homes.
80% have a{freezer}as well as a fridge 33% have a{micro-wave oven}as well as a normal cooker. 66% have a{food {processor}and 36% have electric {carving knives.} 33% have electric {dish washers.
94% of the pupils have a{home computer acquired during the last two years. 50% have{double-glazing}in their homes Over 70% have more than one{television {set,}100% have a{record player}and 64% have a{video recorder.
Just over 50% of the pupils' families have more than one{motor car}at home.
